author: slava77
body:
pp_on_AA is a common modifier for HI, as introduced in #31935.
RecoHI/HiEvtPlaneAlgos/python/HiEvtPlane_cfi.py was apparently left over.
The update should be technical at this point.

this update was confirmed with @mandrenguyen
title: switch modifiers to pp_on_AA for hiEvtPlane
